rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0001
rows.name:
What is taking so long!
When will the target be destroyed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0002
rows.name: Ah, sir... that is[ST:wide ]â€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0003
rows.name:
It appears that a Trion-type barrier
is deployed around the target.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0004
rows.name: A Trion-type barrier, you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Why would mere Earthlings
possess such technology?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Was that not a technology
achievable only in the Qlu system![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Even those Dolls...
Why would an undeveloped primitive race possess things like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Though their civilization level is low,
perhaps Earthlings really were descendants of the Progenitor...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0009
rows.name:
I won't believe in such myths...
No, I won't believe such tall tales![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0010
rows.name:
They are the cancer cells of the universe!
To call them a safety device or such...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0011
rows.name: Number 4 secondary turret silenced![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0012
rows.name: 3rd cluster turret group heavily damaged![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0013
rows.name: The enemy unit's offensive is intensifying![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0014
rows.name:
At this rate, we cannot deal effective blows
to the target![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0015
rows.name: What about the interceptor unit!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0016
rows.name:
They are blocked by a separate enemy unit
and cannot come to guard this ship![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Why can savages of that level fight like this!
Could it be, really!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0017_02
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Bring the Vita around!
I will go out myself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0019
rows.name: Grandmaster, the Vita belongs to the Great One![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Even for you, Grandmaster Luxaar,
your body will not last![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0021
rows.name: I, too, am kin of the Great One![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12070100_MSG0022
rows.name:
I will show you I can use it.
Nay, I must use it![ST:wait ]
